roleset.name: to reverse or annul

example.name: transitive
example.text: Despite warnings [*ICH*-1] from such leaders as former Federal Reserve Board Chairman William McChesney Martin that unfixed commissions would undo the industry , the SEC in September 1973 said [0]full competition must start May l , 1975 .

example.name: passive
example.text: The joint venture is being undone [*], with McCall 's magazine being sold [*-2] last summer to the New York Times Co. 's Magazine Group for about $ 80 million [*U*] , and Time Warner agreeing [*-3] to sell back its 50 % interest in Working Woman and Working Mother to Mr. Lang .
example.arg: with McCall 's magazine being sold [*-2] last summer to the New York Times Co. 's Magazine Group for about $ 80 million [*U*] , and Time Warner agreeing [*-3] to sell back its 50 % interest in Working Woman and Working Mother to Mr. Lang

example.name: arg1, argMs
example.text: The worst " change " we 've seen under Obama is a slow undoing of our human rights here at home , which started under the Bush administration -LRB- and to some extent in the 80s and 90s -RRB- .
example.arg: which started under the Bush administration -LRB- and to some extent in the 80s and 90s -RRB-

roleset.note: UNDO-V NOTES: VN update by Julia. Member of Vncls destroy-44. (from undo.01-v)
UNDOING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, undo-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls Vncls destroy-44. (from undoing.01-n)
